title: How to Add Exercise on a Fitbit

steps.title: Open the Fitbit app on your mobile device.
steps.content: Open the Fitbit app on your mobile device. This app icon looks like a blue background with white dots on it. You can find this app on either your home screen, in the app drawer, or by searching.

steps.title: Tap the Today tab with the multi-dot icon.
steps.content: Tap the Today tab with the multi-dot icon. This might also be labeled Dashboard . You'll find it at the bottom-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap the plus (+) icon on the "Exercise" tile.
steps.content: Tap the plus (+) icon on the "Exercise" tile. You should see a counter of your up-to-date activity.

steps.title: Tap Log Previous.
steps.content: Tap Log Previous . This will indicate that you have already completed the exercise and need to add it to your daily log.

steps.title: Tap an exercise or search for one.
steps.content: Tap an exercise or search for one. You can pick from the list an activity that most closely resembles your exercise. If your exercise is not listed here, choose Workout .

steps.title: Enter the activity details.
steps.content: Enter the activity details. You'll need to log how long you performed the exercise as well as the intensity levels.

steps.title: Tap Log It.
steps.content: Tap Log It . The exercise will be logged and added to your daily activities. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Fitbit app on your mobile device.
steps.content: Open the Fitbit app on your mobile device. This app icon looks like a blue background with white dots on it. You can find this app on either your home screen, in the app drawer, or by searching.

steps.title: Tap your Fitbit picture.
steps.content: Tap your Fitbit picture. You'll see this and the Fitbit's model name in the top left corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Exercise Shortcuts.
steps.content: Tap Exercise Shortcuts . This is usually in the third grouping.

steps.title: Tap Edit.
steps.content: Tap Edit . This will pull up a list of all the exercises you can add to your shortcuts.

steps.title: Tap the exercise you want to add.
steps.content: Tap the exercise you want to add. This adds the exercise to your shortcuts tab. [2] X Research source
